record.jsxtip: Fires after the user changes the value of a field of this time picker. Canceling this event prevents the change from occurring.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the hour, minute, second, milli, or ampm.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this time picker and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this time picker is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this time picker before it is removed from the DOM.
